capacities.name: A
capacities.caption: Aware
capacities.notes: Aware; Is aware of the skill.

capacities.name: C
capacities.caption: Capable
capacities.notes: Capable; Has a demonstrable understanding of the skill.

capacities.name: K
capacities.caption: Knowledgeable
capacities.notes: Knowledgeable; Is knowledgeable about the skill.  A specialise / raven based on effort (Cognitive).

capacities.name: N
capacities.caption: Natural
capacities.notes: Natural; Is a natural at this skill with little cognitive effort (Limbic).
